name: Kizuki - Beast Tamer - Tania [NSFW Support]
description:
I have set up a Discord-Server where we can share images / ideas / prompts and help each other out. Also, if you have a LoRA request, feel free to ask me there.

Creating LoRA takes quite some time. If you want to support my work or gain early access / exclusive loras feel free to check out my Patreon or Ko-Fi.

Last but not least, if you like this LoRA, it would be awesome, if you share your results and leave a like & review. <3

Trigger Words / Settings / Known Issue & Advice:

  • Character: tania, dragon girl, dragon horns, red hair, orange eyes, large breasts, long hair

  • Outfit: collar, white top, long red skirt, detached sleeves, thighhighs, dragon tail

  • Use Outfit Trigger as Negative Prompt for different outfits

  • Recommeneded Weight: 0.50 - 1.00 (Depending on your Model and needs)

  • CFG scale: 5.0 - 10

  • Checkpoint used: Kizuki - Checkpoint Mix Anime / Hentai V2 incl. VAE

  • Known Issue: the collar & black things on her arms retain quite a bit. Also the tail is a bit tricky.

Check my preview images for additional trigger words that might be helpful.
